root.name: Dragon Warrior I & II
root.description: Dragon Warrior I II is a compilation of two of the oldest Japanese role-playing games ever released. Its original release for the SNES in Japan (in 1992) came with improved graphics and eventually a fan translation. and later for the Game Boy Color which was localized in English for its North American release in 2000.Both of these classic Japanese RPG's played an important role back in the Famicom days in laying the foundation of the genre. Many of the genre staples like a turn-based battle system and experience points are part and parcel of both these games. Dragon Warrior I tells a very simple tale of a warrior called The Hero who must save the world from the wrath of the evil Dragon Lord. Dragon Warrior II (released in 1987 in Japan) built upon its predecessor's strength by increasing the number of playable characters from one to four and adding a more intricate plot.
